body.p: The undersigned respectfully represent that at the November Term 1860 of the Clark Circuit Court Judgments were rendered against each of them in favor of the Commonwealth for $20. the offence charged in each of the Indictments being, "Gaming", They say that they are not gamblers, that the gaming charged was only for amusement, not for profit, that they do not pursue that avocation and being poor the payment of their fines would be very onerous The Costs which they will have to pay will alone be a sufficient of for punishment for their offence.

William Cole
William Palmer
Benjamin Stubblefield
John W Gorden
John P Hakil
Marcus Lisle
Nat Turner
We the undersigned citizens of Clark County respectfully concur in the prayer of the above petitions and ask that there fines be remitted --

Jas Flanagan
Jno B Huston
(let the boys off)
J W Laughlin
Theodore Kohlhass
Wm F. Pool
A. H. Buckner
Gilson Wash
obadiah Lacy
P A Artis
B Curry
R Lackey
Jas Clay
Jas T Garner

Clarke Cir Ct
Respite 12 mo
B. M
$20 } Gaming
Wm. Cole & others
Issd Janry 30 1861
